original_title: Breaking Borders: Cross-Dressers & Drag Queens of El Paso, TX
overview: Every Thursday night at a local Taco Cabana in El Paso Texas, Manuel Nunez and friends put on a cross dressing drag queen show titled 'Samantha's Travesti Show'. Through the use of comedy and entertainment, Samantha, Viviana, & Zayda break the borders of transsexual identity and acceptance.
title: Breaking Borders: Cross-Dressers & Drag Queens of El Paso, TX
